oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Oak Ridge High School football practice
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Eleven young men dressed in sports uniforms and helmets are in an athletic field. Seven crouch on the ground and four leap in the air.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Athletic fields; Football; Football players; Oak Ridge High School (Tenn.); Schools; Sports
Brown, Gordon; Corey, Howard; Crigger, Jack; Dawes, Kerr; Ganger, Dan; Lederer, Bob; Meed, Doug; Osborn, Charlie; Owen, Julius; Trent, Hartley; Zirkle, Ray
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal article of September 14, 1944. Bottom row, left to right; Doug Meed; Gordon Brown; Julius Owen; Bob Lederer; Dan Ganger; Hartley Trent and Ray Zirkle. Top row, from left to right; Jack Crigger; Charlie Osborn; Kerr Dawes; and Howard Corey.
PRO 3-1; 8-30-1944; Oak Ridge High School Football Practice
